mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order_info(orderId, tradePrice,productId,buyerCompanyId, sellerCompanyId,orderState,receiptPath, createDate,endDate) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{tradePrice},#{productId}, #{buyerCompanyId},#{sellerCompanyId},#{orderState}, #{receiptPath},#{createDate},#{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT orderId,createDate,tradePrice,orderState FROM tbl_order_info WHERE buyerCompanyId = #{companyId} OR sellerCompanyId = #{companyId} order by orderId desc LIMIT #{page},8
SELECT orderId FROM tbl_order_info WHERE orderId LIKE '%${orderId}%'

SELECT orderId,createDate,tradePrice,orderState,buyerCompanyId FROM tbl_order_info WHERE orderId LIKE '%${orderId}%' AND (buyerCompanyId = #{companyId} OR sellerCompanyId = #{companyId}) LIMIT #{page},8
